typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Site as integer,
		SurveyTransactionId as long,
		ApplicationSourceId as integer,
		Guid as string,
		SurveyId as integer,
		SurveyDescription as string,
		StartSurveyDateTime as string,
		EndSurveyDateTime as string,
		Comment as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		SurveyType as string,
		FlagTransaction as string,
		TotalScore as double,
		CallHistoryGuid as string,
		ReasonCode as string,
		ReasonDescription as string,
		SurveyorId as integer,
		RespondentId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select * from VW_GDMPhotoTaking\n',
	format: 'query') ~> SurveyTransaction
source(output(
		Number as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select Number, Name from Customers',
	format: 'query') ~> Customers
SurveyTransaction sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> sink1
